snippet: Bonobos get farsighted as they age, just as humans do. But the bonobos are trying to get at the lice in each other’s hair, not read the fine print....
lead_paragraph: Bonobos get farsighted as they age, just as humans do. But the bonobos are trying to get at the lice in each other’s hair, not read the fine print.

headline.main: Do They Make Reading Glasses for Older Bonobos?
headline.print_headline: Older Bonobos Could Sure Use Some Glasses
